Bodii/Domain/Entities/DailyLog.swift.description: DailyLog entity already contains all pre-calculated dashboard data: totalCaloriesIn, tdee, netCalories, macros (carbsRatio, proteinRatio, fatRatio), exercise stats (totalCaloriesOut, exerciseMinutes, exerciseCount), sleep data (sleepDuration, sleepStatus), and body composition (weight, bodyFatPct). No runtime calculation needed for dashboard.

Bodii/Presentation/Features/Dashboard/Da.description: Existing DashboardView has placeholder cards for diet, exercise, and sleep. Uses MetabolismViewModel for BMR/TDEE. Has pull-to-refresh and date formatting helpers already implemented. Navigation callback pattern (onNavigateToBody) already established.
